item.title: Preprandial Chat
item.description:
Aizawa Seishisai’s Preprandial Chat Translated by
Todd Munson
No. 2 (Summer 2000)

0

विस्तारः (द्रष्टुं नोद्यम्)

The goal of this translation series is to distribute scholarly articles on the history of Japanese education to an international readership.

HISTORY OF JAPANESE EDUCATION TRANSLATION SERIES 1 (Summer 1999) Umihara Töru, Yoshida Shöin and Shöka Sonjuku: The True Spirit of Education Translated by Charles Andrews

2 (Summer 2000) Aizawa Seishisai, Preprandial Chat Translated by Todd Munson
